snp1.4:3.3: Na kho pana mayaṃ → na kho pana samaṇa (sya-all) | balībadde → balivadde (bj, pts-vp-pli1); balibaddhe (sya-all, csp1ed)
snp1.4:14.2: sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati → saṃdhūmāyati sampadhumāyati (cck); saṃdhūmāyati sampadhūmāyati (sya1ed, sya2ed)
snp1.4:14.3: divasaṃ santatto → divasasantatto (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1)
snp1.4:16.6: Aññataro ca → aññataro ca kho (bj, pts-vp-pli1); aññataro kho (sya-all, km, mr)
